attributes.action: Ownership of Leeds United Football Club
attributes.additional_details: That there should be an enquiry into the Ownership and Running of Leeds United Football Club. That this enquiry should investigate all activities from the purchase by Ken Bates in 2005 to the current Football League decision, despite Conflicts of Interest, to attempt to block the Clubs takeover by Massimo Cellino.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association, but the Government is taking an interest in the matter of ownership and compliance.
